page.title: 16ELMLEY CASTLE,SOCIAL FEARS
page.content: There is considerable concern about the rapid decline in rural bus services,especially for the elderly.This year the W.I. has carried out an extensive survey on public transport.The village shops in Elmley Castle and Little Comberton closed a year ago because of poor turnover;this also meant that the Post Office (an integral part of the shop) closed. Concern over the maintainance of the school building at Elmley Castle has resulted in decoration of the interior by parents.The P.T.A. are increasingly under pressure to provide essential textbooks and equipment.
